name: I Cheated On You
description:
You have done something terrible. Prepare to face the consequences.

An old game by Ric Cowley, I Cheated On You has gained recognition from Rock, Paper, Shotgun, Podtoid, Haywire Magazine, and was mentioned in a 2017 Waypoint article. It has also been the subject of an essay in the book Critical Hits: An Indie Gaming Anthology.

This version has been rebuilt in Twine 2, and makes some minor changes to the style and content to improve pacing.
